_header: To call them which have no suffisance
_description: A Prologue to ‘Summum Sapientie’ [see 5502] found in one MS only — eighteen stanzas rhyme royal

BLHar7578.First Lines:
[T]o calle theim whiche haue ne suffisanceThe dulle appalled mydes
                    to redresse…
BLHar7578.Last Lines:
…ffor vnto youre saueure I haue gret nedeThis furth with al
                    here I wolde procede
BLHar7578.Note:
Initial ‘T’ is missing, with space left for illuminated
                    initial.
